feels.name: Disappointment
feels.quote: In cultivating the fiddler, they utterly neglected the physician.

causedBy.name: Lack of recognition for medical capacity

feels.name: Hope
feels.quote: The patient...was not altogether without hope.

causedBy.name: Hope for the return of her admirer

feels.name: Chagrin
feels.quote: The patient, though violently chagrined at the levity of her quondam admirer...

causedBy.name: Forsaking of the patient by her admirer

Places.name: Tunbridge
Places.description: A location where Doctor Fathom was trying to establish himself as a physician.
